edu.jhu.coe.mt
Class GizaAlignment

java.lang.Object
  edu.jhu.coe.mt.Alignment
      edu.jhu.coe.mt.GizaAlignment
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class GizaAlignment
extends Alignment

GizaAlignments store additional information extracted from GIZA++ data files, including the text, alignment score, sentence number, and filename.

Author:
John DeNero
See Also:
Serialized Form
